task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update ci_task set task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tar_type = #{tarType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_type = #{branchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_group_id = #{contactGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,g.name group_name from ci_task t left join app_cluster g on t.app_cluster_id=g.id left join ci_task_detail td on td.task_id=t.id left join app_instance i on i.id=td.instance_id left join app_host h on h.id=i.host_id where t.del_flag!=1
AND t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.task_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${taskName}','%')
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${groupName}','%')
AND t.branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${branchName}','%')
AND t.tar_type = #{tarType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
order by t.create_date desc
